se.cbb.jprime.mcmc

Class MetropolisHastingsProposal

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.cbb.jprime.mcmc.MetropolisHastingsProposal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Proposal

    public class MetropolisHastingsProposal
extends java.lang.Object
implements Proposal
    Details a state parameter change w.r.t. a Metropolis-Hastings proposal by a Proposer. Thus, enables storing the "backward" and "forward" proposal densities.
    Author:
    Joel Sj√∂strand.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MetropolisHastingsProposal(Proposer proposer, java.util.List<StateParameter> attemptedParams)
      Constructor for a failed proposal, i.e., when parameters could not be perturbed.
      MetropolisHastingsProposal(Proposer proposer, LogDouble forwardDensity, LogDouble backwardDensity, java.util.List<StateParameter> perturbedParams, int noOfPerturbedSubParams)
      Constructor.
      MetropolisHastingsProposal(Proposer proposer, LogDouble forwardDensity, LogDouble backwardDensity, StateParameter perturbedParam, int noOfPerturbedSubParams)
      Constructor for when a single parameter has been perturbed.
      MetropolisHastingsProposal(Proposer proposer, StateParameter attemptedParam)
      Constructor for a failed proposal, i.e., when a parameter could not be perturbed.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LogDouble getBackwardDensity()
      Returns the probability density Q(x;x') for obtaining the old value x given the new value x'.
      LogDouble getDensityRatio()
      Returns the ratio Q(x;x')/Q(x';x) for the old state x and the new state x', i.e.
      LogDouble getForwardDensity()
      Returns the probability density Q(x';x) for obtaining the new value x' given the old value x.
      int getNoOfPerturbedParameters()
      Returns the number of parameters which were in fact perturbed (or at least attempted to be perturbed) by the responsible Proposer for this state change.
      int getNoOfPerturbedSubParameters()
      Returns the total number of sub-parameters which were in fact perturbed by the responsible Proposer for this state change.
      java.util.List<StateParameter> getPerturbedParameters()
      Returns a list of all parameters which were in fact perturbed (or at least attempted to be perturbed) by the responsible Proposer for this state change.
      Proposer getProposer()
      Returns the object which did the perturbation which yielded this object.
      boolean isValid()
      Returns true if the proposal is indeed valid.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MetropolisHastingsProposal

        public MetropolisHastingsProposal(Proposer proposer,
                          LogDouble forwardDensity,
                          LogDouble backwardDensity,
                          java.util.List<StateParameter> perturbedParams,
                          int noOfPerturbedSubParams)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        proposer - the proposer which generated this object.
        forwardDensity - the probability density of obtaining the new state given the old one.
        backwardDensity - the probability density of obtaining the old state given the new one.
        perturbedParams - the actually changed parameters from old state to new state.
        noOfPerturbedSubParams - the total number of actually changed sub-parameters of the above.

      • MetropolisHastingsProposal

        public MetropolisHastingsProposal(Proposer proposer,
                          LogDouble forwardDensity,
                          LogDouble backwardDensity,
                          StateParameter perturbedParam,
                          int noOfPerturbedSubParams)
        Constructor for when a single parameter has been perturbed.
        Parameters:
        proposer - the proposer which generated this object.
        forwardDensity - the probability density of obtaining the new state given the old one.
        backwardDensity - the probability density of obtaining the old state given the new one.
        perturbedParam - the perturbed parameter from old state to new state.
        noOfPerturbedSubParams - the total number of actually changed sub-parameters of the above.

      • MetropolisHastingsProposal

        public MetropolisHastingsProposal(Proposer proposer,
                          java.util.List<StateParameter> attemptedParams)
        Constructor for a failed proposal, i.e., when parameters could not be perturbed. Sets the backward probability density to 0 and the forward probability density to 1.
        Parameters:
        proposer - the proposer which generated this object.
        attemptedParams - the parameters which failed to be perturbed.

      • MetropolisHastingsProposal

        public MetropolisHastingsProposal(Proposer proposer,
                          StateParameter attemptedParam)
        Constructor for a failed proposal, i.e., when a parameter could not be perturbed. Sets the backward probability density to 0 and the forward probability density to 1.
        Parameters:
        proposer - the proposer which generated this object.
        attemptedParam - the parameter which failed to be perturbed.

    • Method Detail

      • getForwardDensity

        public LogDouble getForwardDensity()
        Returns the probability density Q(x';x) for obtaining the new value x' given the old value x.
        Returns:
        the "forward" probability density.

      • getBackwardDensity

        public LogDouble getBackwardDensity()
        Returns the probability density Q(x;x') for obtaining the old value x given the new value x'.
        Returns:
        the "backward" probability density.

      • getDensityRatio

        public LogDouble getDensityRatio()
        Returns the ratio Q(x;x')/Q(x';x) for the old state x and the new state x', i.e. the ratio between the "backward" and "forward" proposal densities respectively.
        Returns:
        the ratio between the "backward" and "forward" proposal densities.
